name: Build a Toy Railway - game for boys
name_original: Build a Toy Railway - game for boys
description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM ROAD
Complete the railway, and run the train to ride in it! Explore 8 different construction schemes of roads to complete and install houses, signs, flowers, flower beds, etc.

SEARCH, RUN
In order to complete each road, you need to ride a construction machine and look for rails, so you are given the freedom to search and move and finish building in any order that you like! Can you find all the details on stage?

MANAGE MACHINES
At your disposal is a building magnetic crane. He draws the rails to his hook. Go search for a large map. As soon as you find and bring it to the place, the rails will be installed in the necessary place.
